Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This is an antique brass counter-style bell. It consists of a brass dome hanging on a short base with a thumb-triggered clapper on the side. The base is highly decorative with cast over-lapping leaves. The bell is in excellent condition and measures 4" tall and has a base diameter of 3.5".
This is an antique brass counter-style bell. It consists of a brass dome hanging on a short base with a thumb-triggered clapper on the side.
